instructions.da: Foretag et svagt højresving mod Destination 1
instructions.de: Am Kreisverkehr leicht rechts Richtung Destination 1
instructions.en: Make a slight right towards Destination 1
instructions.es: En la rotonda siga ligeramente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: En la rotonda siga ligeramente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Au rond-point, tourner légèrement à droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Di bundaran, lakukan agak ke kanan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Alla rotonda fai una destra leggermente verso Destination 1
instructions.nl: Ga rechts op de rotonde richting Destination 1
instructions.pl: Na rondzie weź łagodnie w prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Na rotatória, vire suave à direita em direção à Destination 1
instructions.ro: La sensul giratoriu virați ușor dreapta spre Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 üzerindeki göbekli kavşakta hafif sağ yöne dön
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь плавно праворуч в напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Quẹo phải nghiêng về hướng Destination 1
